name: ExCode010
description:
Short Description

ExCode010 - puzzle-platformer, solve all the puzzles and fight the boss.

Default keyboard controls

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - Shoot
  • E - Interaction
  • F - Flashlight

Description

Features:

  • More than 13 exciting and varied levels in which you can test your dexterity.
  • Interesting boss.
  • Stylish pixel graphic.

Special thanks

Thank you for downloading this game, I am a novice game developer, with great ambition and desire to create interesting and exciting projects. Please evaluate this game, it's very important for me to know in what direction I'm moving.

Special thanks to 0x72 for the excellent Tileset, which inspired me to develop this game)

Thanks to all the other artists who took the individual textures, if you need to contact me)

Thanks to my friends who tested the game and gave me feedback.

Love from
